Title: Precision measurement of the speed of propagation of neutrinos using the MINOS detectors
Source: Phys Rev D Part Fields Gravit Cosmol
Abstract: © 2015 American Physical Society.We report a two-detector measurement of the propagation speed of neutrinos over a baseline of 734 km. The measurement was made with the NuMI beam at Fermilab between the near and far MINOS detectors. The fractional difference between the neutrino speed and the speed of light is determined to be (v/c-1)=(1.0±1.1)×10-6, consistent with relativistic neutrinos.
